channel.title: Minecraft
channel.description: Is there a way how i can play minecraft for free? i got the client but it says i need to log in once to play offline. If there is a way can someone tell me it.

item.title: Minecraft
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

Thanks guys,

But i downloaded a client then there come’s i need to update my video driver so i gonna try that first

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:8, topic:385541”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=481294.msg3524731#msg3524731 date=1299707715]

^No.
There is a tutorial in this section on how to play on 1.1_02, which has a two cracked clients posted. Use one of those.

Why play 1.1_02 when there’s a cracked client for the latest version?

Because the cracked clients in that tutorial can be used for any version?

Hurr.

Or just get my launcher and play newest automatically. The OP just wants to play, he said nothing bout a specific version.

Your client has more potential for fixing future problems, however, there is no problem with the cracked client I provided as it does exactly what yours does.
[/quote]
Doesnt yours have a bug in it though? Also, mind if I use your ‘force update’ checkbox idea? Id have an idea for it.[/quote]

Sure.

Read full topic
